statements: SELECT * FROM media_regulator_complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, media_title, media_type FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT media_title, complaint_date FROM media_regulator_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT media_type, COUNT(*) as total_complaints FROM media_regulator_complaints GROUP BY media_type;
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM media_regulator_complaints ORDER BY media_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT complaint_id, media_title, media_type FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT media_title, complaint_text FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE media_type = 'TV Show' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE status = 'Resolved' AND media_type = 'Movie';
SELECT media_title, complaint_text, status FROM media_regulator_complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Media_Complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, media_title, complaint_date FROM Media_Complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_description FROM Media_Complaints WHERE media_title = 'Fake News Daily';
SELECT * FROM Media_Regulators WHERE regulator_name LIKE '%Association%';
SELECT regulator_name, regulator_email, regulator_phone FROM Media_Regulators ORDER BY regulator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY media_title ASC;
SELECT complaint_id, media_title, complainant_name FROM Media_Complaints WHERE LENGTH(complaint_description) > 100 AND complainant_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Media_Complaints WHERE media_title LIKE '%news%' AND complaint_description LIKE '%false%' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description, complainant_name FROM Media_Complaints WHERE complaint_description LIKE '%violations%' OR complaint_description LIKE '%misrepresentation%';
SELECT mc.complaint_id, mc.media_title, mr.regulator_name FROM Media_Complaints mc JOIN Media_Regulators mr ON mc.complainant_name = mr.regulator_name ORDER BY mc.complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Complaints
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Media_Users
SELECT regulator_name, regulator_contact FROM Media_Regulators
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Media_Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT complaint_id, media_type, complaint_text FROM Media_Complaints WHERE media_type = 'TV'
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM Media_Complaints WHERE media_type = 'TV' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Media_Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT regulator_name, regulator_contact FROM Media_Regulators WHERE regulator_name = 'FCC';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_id FROM Media_Users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Media_Complaints JOIN Media_Users ON Media_Complaints.complaint_id = Media_Users.user_id WHERE Media_Complaints.complaint_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE media_type = 'TV';
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Media ORDER BY media_name DESC;
SELECT complainant_name, complainant_email, complainant_phone FROM Complainants;
SELECT * FROM Complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE media_type = 'TV';
SELECT complainant_name, complainant_email FROM Complainants WHERE complainant_id > 5;
SELECT media_name, media_regulator FROM Media ORDER BY media_name ASC;
SELECT complaint_text, response_text FROM Complaints c JOIN Responses r ON c.complaint_id = r.complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM Media_Regulator_Complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_category, complaint_date FROM Media_Regulator_Complaints;
SELECT content_name, media_type FROM Media_Content WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulator_name, regulator_email, regulator_phone FROM Media_Regulators ORDER BY regulator_name DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM Media_Complaint_Responses WHERE response_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_category, complaint_description FROM Media_Regulator_Complaints
SELECT content_name, media_type, release_date FROM Media_Content WHERE content_rating = 'PG-13'
SELECT regulator_name, regulator_email FROM Media_Regulators WHERE regulator_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM Media_Complaint_Responses ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM Media_Regulator_Contacts
